introduction: ÜLO PIKKOVBorn on June 15, 1976 in Tallinn.Graduated from the Institute of Law, University of Tartu in 2005.Graduated from the Turku School of Art and Media (Finland) in 1998.Graduated from the Tallinn Secondary School No. 49 in 1994.2006 -…         Associate Professor, Estonian Academy of Arts, department of animation2004 -…         Legal expert of Estonian Film Foundation2001 – 2002    Estonian Television, scriptwriter for series „Anima zone“1998 -…         Film director in animation production company Eesti JoonisfilmPikkov’s articles, caricatures and illustrations have been published in the Estonian press. He has illustrated dozen books for different writers.
